description: Manage scheduled tasks and cron jobs

form.cron_help: Format: minute hour day month weekday (e.g., 0 * * * * = every hour)

tooltips.click_to_activate: Click to activate - Task will run automatically based on schedule

help.title: How Scheduled Tasks Work
help.intro: Scheduled tasks allow you to automate routine commands like cache clearing, backups, and maintenance jobs.
help.req_1: Task must be set to Active (click the status button)
help.req_2: Valid cron schedule must be configured
help.req_3: Server cron job must be running (see below)
help.cron_desc: Add this line to your server's crontab (run 'crontab -e'):
help.cron_hint: This command tells your server to check for scheduled tasks every minute.
